endpoints.description: Retrieve real-time current stock levels for a specified product.
Access upcoming delivery schedules for inventory items.
Set up automatic restock notifications for a particular product.
View a historical log of triggered restock notifications.
Fetch a comprehensive list of all tracked products with inventory details.
Initiate an order to restock a product based on upcoming demand forecasts.
List all associated distribution centers and their respective stockholding details.
Analyze and retrieve items' sales and consumption data to predict demand.
Remove a previously set restock notification alert using its identifier.
Retrieve a record of instances where stock quantities fell below defined thresholds.
